name: fresh-solver
description: OR-Tools constraint programming solver with Next.js GUI

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: uv run black . && uv run ruff check . --exclude='gui/scripts' --exclude='scripts' --exclude='.claude' && uv run mypy src/
scripts.build:netlify: cd gui/gui && npm install --prefer-offline && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd gui/gui && npm install
